if.test: sdate != null and edate != null and sdate != '' and edate != ''

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) co FROM EMI_METER_BILLING a INNER JOIN EMI_METER_INFO mi ON (a.METER_ID = mi.METER_ID) INNER JOIN EMI_DEVICE_INFO di ON (mi.DEVICE_ID = di.DEVICE_ID) INNER JOIN emi_branch_info b ON (b.branch_id = mi.branch_id)

SELECT a. meter_id , meter_serial , b.branch_nm , (SELECT branch_nm FROM emi_branch_info WHERE branch_id = b.branch_parent_id) AS parent_branch_nm , meter_serial , ifnull(fnc_get_code_nm(mi.meter_type),'') as meter_type , device_serial , DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(a.billing_dt,'00'),'${prop.small.dt}') AS billing_dt , a.billing_dt AS billing_dt_int , active_imp_tot , apprent_imp_tot , lead_imp_tot , lagging_imp_tot , pf_imp_tot , active_imp_rate1 , apprent_imp_rate1 , lead_imp_rate1 , lagging_imp_rate1 , pf_imp_rate1 , active_imp_rate2 , apprent_imp_rate2 , lead_imp_rate2 , lagging_imp_rate2 , pf_imp_rate2 , active_imp_rate3 , apprent_imp_rate3 , lead_imp_rate3 , lagging_imp_rate3 , pf_imp_rate3 , active_imp_rate4 , apprent_imp_rate4 , lead_imp_rate4 , lagging_imp_rate4 , pf_imp_rate4 , active_exp_tot , apprent_exp_tot , lead_exp_tot , lagging_exp_tot , pf_exp_tot , active_exp_rate1 , apprent_exp_rate1 , lead_exp_rate1 , lagging_exp_rate1 , pf_exp_rate1 , active_exp_rate2 , apprent_exp_rate2 , lead_exp_rate2 , lagging_exp_rate2 , pf_exp_rate2 , active_exp_rate3 , apprent_exp_rate3 , lead_exp_rate3 , lagging_exp_rate3 , pf_exp_rate3 , active_exp_rate4 , apprent_exp_rate4 , lead_exp_rate4 , lagging_exp_rate4 , pf_exp_rate4 , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS update_dt FROM EMI_METER_BILLING a INNER JOIN EMI_METER_INFO mi ON (a.METER_ID = mi.METER_ID) INNER JOIN EMI_DEVICE_INFO di ON (mi.DEVICE_ID = di.DEVICE_ID) INNER JOIN emi_branch_info b ON (b.branch_id = mi.branch_id)

SELECT meter_id , billing_dt , mtime , itime , active_imp_tot , apprent_imp_tot , lead_imp_tot , lagging_imp_tot , pf_imp_tot , active_imp_rate1 , apprent_imp_rate1 , lead_imp_rate1 , lagging_imp_rate1 , pf_imp_rate1 , active_imp_rate2 , apprent_imp_rate2 , lead_imp_rate2 , lagging_imp_rate2 , pf_imp_rate2 , active_imp_rate3 , apprent_imp_rate3 , lead_imp_rate3 , lagging_imp_rate3 , pf_imp_rate3 , active_imp_rate4 , apprent_imp_rate4 , lead_imp_rate4 , lagging_imp_rate4 , pf_imp_rate4 , active_exp_tot , apprent_exp_tot , lead_exp_tot , lagging_exp_tot , pf_exp_tot , active_exp_rate1 , apprent_exp_rate1 , lead_exp_rate1 , lagging_exp_rate1 , pf_exp_rate1 , active_exp_rate2 , apprent_exp_rate2 , lead_exp_rate2 , lagging_exp_rate2 , pf_exp_rate2 , active_exp_rate3 , apprent_exp_rate3 , lead_exp_rate3 , lagging_exp_rate3 , pf_exp_rate3 , active_exp_rate4 , apprent_exp_rate4 , lead_exp_rate4 , lagging_exp_rate4 , pf_exp_rate4 , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS update_dt FROM EMI_METER_BILLING a WHERE meter_id = #{meter_id} and billing_dt = #{billing_dt}
